name: Abdoel Samaai
review: Tara is the most dedicated person I've known & very much a perfectionist with all that she's does.

name: Amber-Kaye
review: She's super determined to finish any task that's handed to her even if she has to make some sacrifices which she will.

name: laeeq Majal
review: All i can say is that she is super confident and puts her best foot forward in everything she does.

name: Lyle Kepkey
review: A very focused person even though I do not know her that well but all I can say is that she is one determined.
